publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5620 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
